name: Café International Solo
description:
"Café International Solo" is based on the classic board game that was elected Board Game of The Year 1989 Germany (over one million sold). "Café International Solo" contains the two full single player games "Solitaire" and "Time Game" as they are in the App "Café International" that has been rated fantastic by players around the globe and was called "a great way to experience this classic 'Spiel des Jahres' winner." by Boardgamegeek.com

Highlights:
• Choose from Solitaire or Time Game
• Strategically place international guests at tables to earn points
• Optimized graphics for new iPad and iPhone 5 with full Retina support
• Quick tutorial for an easy start
• Help function for when you need visual clues
• Game Center integration for worldwide high score and achievements
